::DarkMouse/KitKat::


"Yes, as you command Megatron." "KitKat, help me get this Maximal to 
Scorponok's Lab."  She turned and went to fetch the lift.

KitKat helped DarkMouse lift the bot onto the lift and assisted in 
getting Dracona into the lab.  Once in the lab, they put Dracona on a 
table and strapped her down. 

DarkMouse got the antidote and injected it into Dracona.
"Commander Megatron, she will awaken in a few minutes."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Megatron:
> 
> 
> "I will deal with that fool later. I believe he can handle things 
himself. I 
> will send someone after him soon." Megatron said. He turned his 
attention 
> back to Dracona. "But this Maximal I will have to be my first 
priority. Take 
> her into Scoronok's lab, and give her an antidote."
> 
> Terrorsaur transformed to beast mode and flew off. He headed for 
the device 
> that went flying out of Dracona's hand.
>
